React Data Aggregator

With API calls for all the things! This is a combo React app + separate Rails API app. It's loaded with location-specific feeds, which are the product of 6 different APIs repackaged as one inside the Rails API. All of that makes the Rails API a pretty tidy package to serve to the React app. It's tempting to call it ETL, but there is no actual saving to a db, so instead it's just a killer API.

Check out the repo README for code snippets
and screenshots of the most interesting parts.

Tech Used: React, create-react-app, Rails 5.2.0, Ruby 2.5.0, API, PostgreSQL

My Role: solo project, full stack
